name: Wisdom
text: To be a trusted name in the investment world, known for our expertise and ability to identify, empower and expand high quality healthcare businesses.

name: Endurance
text: To be synonymous with long-term success and value creation for all parties involved and for the benefit of the broader world.

name: Wealth
text: To profitably grow our portfolio companies, generating substantial returns for their stakeholders and ours for generations to come.
